page.title: 07Mobile Homes
page.content: The{Glendene}site covers five acres and is open all year round being wholly{residential.}It is fourteen years old and has fifty{mobile homes.} It costs Â£9.75 a week to rent the plot of land which the home stands on.The owner of the site has recently bought Westwoods next door which is also going to be a residential site as from January 1st.1986.Each mobile home has at least one parking space or garage and all the homes have electricity. There is no shop on the site but vans come round and supply the owners needs of fuel and food.Some have double glazing and all possess a small garden.The structures have an approximate life of twenty years,many last longer.The residents of the site are mainly retired,and there is a ruling of no children,but pets are allowed.Ossemsley Copse is north.
